tag_list: sync, sympatico, simon, tech, technology, editor, blog, blogger, cohen, canada, toronto
overview:
Simon Cohen is the editor of Canadian technology site, Sync.ca, a part of the Sympatico.ca network of web properties owned and operated by Bell Media.

In addition to editing Sync.ca, Cohen also writes for the site’s blog, sync-blog.com, and has weekly appearances on CTV News Channel, a 24-hour news station, under the banner “Sync Up with Simon Cohen.”

Prior to working for Sympatico.ca, Cohen was one of the first Canadian employees of AOL, where he held the position of Interactive Media Producer, and was responsible for AOL Canada’s Computing channel, among others.

Simon Cohen is a graduate of the University of Western Ontario where he earned a B.A. in English & Film.

He lives is Toronto, Ontario with his wife and two children.
